section.title: Configure the dashboard for HTTP
section.para: You can configure the dashboard for a simple HTTP deployment. The standard installation uses a non-encrypted HTTP channel.

step.para: Specify the host for your OpenStack Identity service endpoint in the local_settings.py file with the OPENSTACK_HOST setting.
